name: AURA NETWORK SYSTEMS
description: FAA-compliant nationwide network that utilizes a license spectrum to enable BVLOS ops.
sampleDescriptions: H.R. 3935 - Securing Growth and Robust Leadership in American Aviation Act FAA: Third party service supplier approval process. Ensuring approvals of BVLOS operations above 400'.
